channel.title: Comments on: Object placement using a data file

item.title: By: Tanmay
item.dc:creator: Tanmay
item.description: I have the same problem, It seems the dummy plot is not able to read/recognize the x or y values. I could fix it by setting xrange and yrange before the dummy plot.
item.content:encoded:
I have the same problem, It seems the dummy plot is not able to read/recognize the x or y values.
I could fix it by setting xrange and yrange before the dummy plot.

item.title: By: Alessandro
item.dc:creator: Alessandro
item.description:
How is evaluated the y parameter resulting from (CMD = CMD.add_loudspeaker($1,$2,$3))?
I modified add_loudspeaker() to draw a list of roto-translated pieces of circle, reading position and orientation from a file, but when I execute it I obtain the following error:
all points y value undefined!
Did I forget to set some important parameters?
item.content:encoded:
How is evaluated the y parameter resulting from (CMD = CMD.add_loudspeaker($1,$2,$3))?

I modified add_loudspeaker() to draw a list of roto-translated pieces of circle,
reading position and orientation from a file, but when I execute it I obtain the following error:

all points y value undefined!

Did I forget to set some important parameters?
